trans-unit.source: Microsoft Pay Standard| Microsoft Docs

seg-source.mrk: Microsoft Pay Standard| Microsoft Docs

target.mrk: Microsoft Pay Standard | Microsoft Docs

trans-unit.source: Provides information about the Microsoft Pay extension

seg-source.mrk: Provides information about the Microsoft Pay extension

target.mrk: Poskytuje informace o rozšíření Microsoft Pay

trans-unit.source: The Microsoft Pay Extension

seg-source.mrk: The Microsoft Pay Extension

target.mrk: Rozšíření Microsoft Pay

trans-unit.source: Customers continuously require higher customer service, both in terms of the quality of product but also in terms of delivery and payment services.

seg-source.mrk: Customers continuously require higher customer service, both in terms of the quality of product but also in terms of delivery and payment services.

target.mrk: Zákazníci neustále vyžadují vyšší zákaznický servis, a to jak z hlediska kvality produktu, tak i z hlediska dodacích a platebních služeb.

trans-unit.source: The Microsoft Pay service helps you increase your customer service.

seg-source.mrk: The Microsoft Pay service helps you increase your customer service.

target.mrk: Služba Microsoft Pay vám pomůže zvýšit zákaznický servis.

trans-unit.source: The Microsoft Pay extension adds a Microsoft Pay link to your sales documents so customers can easily pay using Microsoft Pay.

seg-source.mrk: The Microsoft Pay extension adds a Microsoft Pay link to your sales documents so customers can easily pay using Microsoft Pay.

target.mrk: Rozšíření Microsoft Pay přidá do vašich prodejních dokumentů odkaz Microsoft Pay, takže zákazníci mohou snadno platit pomocí Microsoft Pay.

trans-unit.source: Then you can send the documents by email to provide higher customer service and shorten the time it takes for customers’ payments to arrive on your bank account.

seg-source.mrk: Then you can send the documents by email to provide higher customer service and shorten the time it takes for customers’ payments to arrive on your bank account.

target.mrk: Poté můžete dokumenty odeslat e-mailem, abyste poskytli vyšší zákaznický servis a zkrátili dobu potřebnou k tomu, aby platby zákazníků dorazily na váš bankovní účet.

trans-unit.source: The Microsoft Pay extension provides the following benefits:

seg-source.mrk: The Microsoft Pay extension provides the following benefits:

target.mrk: Rozšíření Microsoft Pay poskytuje následující výhody:

trans-unit.source: Customer payments appear faster on your bank account.

seg-source.mrk: Customer payments appear faster on your bank account.

target.mrk: Platby zákazníků se na vašem bankovním účtu zobrazují rychleji.

trans-unit.source: Customers have more ways to pay invoices.

seg-source.mrk: Customers have more ways to pay invoices.

target.mrk: Zákazníci mají více způsobů, jak platit faktury.

trans-unit.source: Microsoft Pay offers a trustworthy payment service, which customers prefer to entering credit card information on unknown web sites.

seg-source.mrk: Microsoft Pay offers a trustworthy payment service, which customers prefer to entering credit card information on unknown web sites.

target.mrk: Microsoft Pay nabízí důvěryhodnou platební službu, kterou zákazníci upřednostňují zadávání informací o kreditní kartě na neznámých webových stránkách.

trans-unit.source: Microsoft Pay offers multiple ways of handling payments, including credit card processing, such as PayPal and Stripe.

seg-source.mrk: Microsoft Pay offers multiple ways of handling payments, including credit card processing, such as PayPal and Stripe.

target.mrk: Microsoft Pay nabízí několik způsobů zpracování plateb, včetně zpracování kreditní karty, například PayPal a Stripe.

trans-unit.source: The Microsoft Pay link can be embedded automatically on every invoice document or by the user.

seg-source.mrk: The Microsoft Pay link can be embedded automatically on every invoice document or by the user.

target.mrk: Odkaz Microsoft Pay může být automaticky nebo uživatelem vložen do každého fakturačního dokumentu.

trans-unit.source: Because this functionality is built as an extension, it gives you full control to enable it when and if your business processes require it.

seg-source.mrk: Because this functionality is built as an extension, it gives you full control to enable it when and if your business processes require it.

target.mrk: Protože je tato funkce vytvořena jako rozšíření, poskytuje vám plnou kontrolu když je to možné a pokud to vaše obchodní procesy vyžadují.

trans-unit.source: Enabling payment service extensions is free in [!INCLUDE[d365fin](includes/d365fin_md.md)], however, you will need to contact the payment service to get an account.

seg-source.mrk: Enabling payment service extensions is free in [!INCLUDE[d365fin](includes/d365fin_md.md)], however, you will need to contact the payment service to get an account.

target.mrk: Povolení rozšíření platebních služeb je zdarma, v [!INCLUDE[d365fin](includes/d365fin_md.md)] pro získání účtu však budete muset kontaktovat platební službu.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Enable Customer Payment Through Payment Services](sales-how-enable-payment-service-extensions.md).

seg-source.mrk: For more information, see [Enable Customer Payment Through Payment Services](sales-how-enable-payment-service-extensions.md).

target.mrk: Pro více informací navštivte (odkaz) [Povolení plateb zákazníkům prostřednictvím platebních služeb](sales-how-enable-payment-service-extensions.md).

trans-unit.source: See Also

seg-source.mrk: See Also

target.mrk: Viz také
